INSERT INTO dbo._AB_tb_IFR_History (aID,HID,syscreated,Waiting,WaitingReason,bkstknr,RequestComments,WorkflowComments,Approved,Status ,prev_HID,prev_syscreated,prev_Waiting,prev_WaitingReason,prev_bkstknr,prev_RequestComments,prev_WorkflowComments,prev_Approved,prev_Status ,first_created ,runid,rowstatus)
SELECT a.ID , a.HID , a.syscreated , a.FreeBoolField_01 as Waiting , a.FreeTextField_01 as WaitingReason , a.FreeIntField_01 AS bkstknr , a.RequestComments , a.WorkflowComments , a.Approved , a.Status -- 2 = afgekeurd, 1 = Goedgekeurd, 0 = Open , a_prev.* , a_first.* , '%runid%' , 1 FROM dbo._AB_sy_Absences a WITH (NOLOCK) CROSS APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) a1.HID as prev_HID , a1.syscreated as prev_syscreated , ISNULL(a1.FreeBoolField_01, 0) as prev_Waiting , a1.FreeTextField_01 as prev_WaitingReason , a1.FreeIntField_01 AS prev_bkstknr , a1.RequestComments as prev_RequestComments , a1.WorkflowComments as prev_WorkflowComments , a1.Approved as prev_Approved , a1.Status as prev_Status FROM dbo._AB_sy_Absences a1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND a1.Type = a.Type AND a1.FreeGuidField_02 = a.FreeGuidField_02 AND a1.syscreated < a.syscreated ORDER BY a1.syscreated DESC ) a_prev OUTER APPLY ( SELECT MIN(a2.syscreated) as first_created FROM dbo._AB_sy_Absences a2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND a2.Type = a.Type AND a2.FreeGuidField_02 = a.FreeGuidField_02 GROUP BY a2.FreeGuidField_02 ) a_first WHERE 1=1 AND a.Type = 260 AND a.Status = 0 -- Open (No need to change when approved or finished) AND a_prev.Prev_Waiting = 1 -- Last request was waiting AND a_prev.prev_Status = 2 -- Last request is Finished (not approved because this can be the request from the last approver) AND a.FreeBoolField_01 = 0 -- Current request is not waiting
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_tb_IFR_History h WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE h.aID = a.ID AND h.rowstatus IN (1, 2)) -- succesfully altered, or currently altering
SELECT aID as ID , prev_Waiting as FreeBoolField_01 , prev_WaitingReason as FreeTextField_01 FROM dbo._AB_tb_IFR_History h WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND h.rowstatus = 1 AND h.runid = '%runid%'

UPDATE h SET rowstatus = ISNULL(r.rowstatus, -1) , errormessage = ISNULL(r.errormessage, 'Not Processed') , p_sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_IFR_History h WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) LEFT JOIN [ABEI].dbo._AB_Entity_Results r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.jobid = %jobid% AND r.runid = '%runid%' AND r.ReferenceValue = h.aID WHERE 1=1 AND h.rowstatus = 1 AND h.runid = '%runid%'
